title: At least 30 bodies found on a boat along a migrant route off Senegal
AI AI Yo: 'Student' Modi gees up Artificial Intelligence
content: PM Narendra Modi engaged with corporate leaders in New York, focusing on the potential of artificial intelligence to address issues in India. He emphasized India's policy of promoting AI for all and invited tech companies like nVidia and Google to collaborate on co-developing and co-producing technologies in India. Intellectual property protection was also discussed.
summary: PM Narendra Modi engaged with corporate leaders in New York, focusing on the potential of artificial intelligence to address issues in India. He emphasized India's policy of promoting AI for all and invited tech companies like nVidia and Google to collaborate on co-developing and co-producing technologies in India. Intellectual property protection was also discussed.

title: Megyn Kelly says 'Ozempic Oprah' lost both weight and heart
content: Megyn Kelly criticized Oprah Winfrey's townhall interview with Kamala Harris, accusing Oprah of avoiding tough questions and promoting propaganda. Additionally, a TikTok creator whose video was featured in Kamala Harris-Oprah townhall claimed it was used without permission and clarified she does not support Harris for president. “I have made it very clear that I don’t support Kamala Harris at all,” Blaire Allison said in the video.
summary: Megyn Kelly criticized Oprah Winfrey's townhall interview with Kamala Harris, accusing Oprah of avoiding tough questions and promoting propaganda. Additionally, a TikTok creator whose video was featured in Kamala Harris-Oprah townhall claimed it was used without permission and clarified she does not support Harris for president. “I have made it very clear that I don’t support Kamala Harris at all,” Blaire Allison said in the video.

title: PM Modi's US visit: A meet with global leaders
Cathay Pacific bans two passengers as seat-reclining dispute turns 'xenophobic'
content: Cathay Pacific Airlines banned two passengers after an argument over seat-reclining escalated into xenophobic slurs on a flight from Hong Kong to London. The incident highlights ongoing tensions between mainland China and Hong Kong. Cathay Pacific apologised and reiterated its zero-tolerance policy for disrespectful behavior, promising to improve service standards.
summary: Cathay Pacific Airlines banned two passengers after an argument over seat-reclining escalated into xenophobic slurs on a flight from Hong Kong to London. The incident highlights ongoing tensions between mainland China and Hong Kong. Cathay Pacific apologised and reiterated its zero-tolerance policy for disrespectful behavior, promising to improve service standards.

title: Biden administration proposes ban of Chinese, Russian car parts
content: The Biden administration proposes a rule to block the sale and import of Chinese- and Russian-made hardware and software for connected vehicles, aiming to bolster US security against hacking threats. The ban targets vehicles with external communication systems, citing risks of foreign interference. Public comments are invited for 30 days post-publication.
summary: The Biden administration proposes a rule to block the sale and import of Chinese- and Russian-made hardware and software for connected vehicles, aiming to bolster US security against hacking threats. The ban targets vehicles with external communication systems, citing risks of foreign interference. Public comments are invited for 30 days post-publication.

title: Trump Florida shooting: Alleged gunman Ryan Routh wrote of 'assassination attempt', offered $150,000 bounty to ‘finish the job’
content: Ryan Routh, aged 58, allegedly attempted to assassinate former President Donald Trump at his Florida golf course by aiming a rifle through the tree line. He had earlier written a letter offering $150,000 for Trump's assassination. Routh faces federal gun charges and additional charges may be pending as the investigation continues.
summary: Ryan Routh, aged 58, allegedly attempted to assassinate former President Donald Trump at his Florida golf course by aiming a rifle through the tree line. He had earlier written a letter offering $150,000 for Trump's assassination. Routh faces federal gun charges and additional charges may be pending as the investigation continues.

title: Oil, prostitutes, candles: What ex-girlfriend Cassie said about Sean 'Diddy' Combs
content: The allegations made by singer Cassie Ventura, a former girlfriend of Combs, have brought significant attention to the case. Ventura filed a civil lawsuit against Combs, alleging years of abuse and forced participation in these "freak-offs." In her lawsuit, Cassie claimed that Combs directed her to pour "excessive" amounts of oil on herself, instructed her where to touch prostitutes, and filmed the encounters while masturbating. She described these acts as "personal art projects" for Combs, noting how he would adjust candles to achieve the perfect lighting for his videos.
summary: The allegations made by singer Cassie Ventura, a former girlfriend of Combs, have brought significant attention to the case. Ventura filed a civil lawsuit against Combs, alleging years of abuse and forced participation in these "freak-offs." In her lawsuit, Cassie claimed that Combs directed her to pour "excessive" amounts of oil on herself, instructed her where to touch prostitutes, and filmed the encounters while masturbating. She described these acts as "personal art projects" for Combs, noting how he would adjust candles to achieve the perfect lighting for his videos.

title: RFK Jr may sue Olivia Nuzzi for 'bombarding' him with nudes: 'No romance, he was chased by porn'
content: Jessica Read Kraus, who knows both Nuzzi and Kennedy Jr, said Nuzzi tricked Kennedy Jr into receiving her "racy messages" after he first blocked her number over a flirtatious remark she made just two weeks after she wrote the profile on RFK Jr. “Once unblocked, she bombarded him with increasingly pornographic photos and videos that he found difficult to resist. After brief exchanges, he would block her again,” Kraus alleged.
summary: Jessica Read Kraus, who knows both Nuzzi and Kennedy Jr, said Nuzzi tricked Kennedy Jr into receiving her "racy messages" after he first blocked her number over a flirtatious remark she made just two weeks after she wrote the profile on RFK Jr. “Once unblocked, she bombarded him with increasingly pornographic photos and videos that he found difficult to resist. After brief exchanges, he would block her again,” Kraus alleged.

title: Janet Jackson says Kamala Harris is not black, apologizes (or not), fires spokesperson
content: Jackson said Elmasri does not represent her and the apology statement has no connection with Elmasri. Elmasri told the Daily Beast that he was fired due to disagreements over this particular issue. He said he was flooded with phone calls after Jackson denied the apology statement but he maintained "all support to Kamala Harris".
summary: Jackson said Elmasri does not represent her and the apology statement has no connection with Elmasri. Elmasri told the Daily Beast that he was fired due to disagreements over this particular issue. He said he was flooded with phone calls after Jackson denied the apology statement but he maintained "all support to Kamala Harris".

title: When Kamala Harris denied Kimberly Guilfoyle a job: 'She called and pretended to be...'
content: Donald Trump Jr's fiancee Kimberly Guilfoyle alleged that Kamala Harris attempted to block her from a job over two decades ago when both were young lawyers. Despite Harris' alleged interference, Guilfoyle was hired though Kamala Harris left the job soon after. Those who know both of them confirm that Kamala Harris and Guilfoyle never got along, though Harris never admitted she tried to block the job.
summary: Donald Trump Jr's fiancee Kimberly Guilfoyle alleged that Kamala Harris attempted to block her from a job over two decades ago when both were young lawyers. Despite Harris' alleged interference, Guilfoyle was hired though Kamala Harris left the job soon after. Those who know both of them confirm that Kamala Harris and Guilfoyle never got along, though Harris never admitted she tried to block the job.

title: South Africa's N3 highway reopens after severe snowstorm disruptions
content: South Africa's N3 highway at Van Reenen's Pass has reopened following a severe snowstorm that disrupted traffic between Gauteng and KwaZulu-Natal. Authorities advise daytime travel due to lingering slippery conditions. The storm left many stranded for hours, prompting emergency services and humanitarian aid. The government urges citizens to stay informed through local radio stations and social media updates.
summary: South Africa's N3 highway at Van Reenen's Pass has reopened following a severe snowstorm that disrupted traffic between Gauteng and KwaZulu-Natal. Authorities advise daytime travel due to lingering slippery conditions. The storm left many stranded for hours, prompting emergency services and humanitarian aid. The government urges citizens to stay informed through local radio stations and social media updates.

title: Failed test of Russian RS-28 Sarmat missile captured in satellite imagery
content: Satellite images from Maxar dated September 21 show signs of a potential failure during a test of Russia's RS-28 Sarmat missile at Plesetsk Cosmodrome. A large crater and surrounding damage were observed, indicating a serious incident. The Russian defence ministry has not issued any statements or announced recent tests involving the missile.
summary: Satellite images from Maxar dated September 21 show signs of a potential failure during a test of Russia's RS-28 Sarmat missile at Plesetsk Cosmodrome. A large crater and surrounding damage were observed, indicating a serious incident. The Russian defence ministry has not issued any statements or announced recent tests involving the missile.

title: Maldives president seeks an end to Gaza war, more dynamic multilateral system
content: At the UN Summit of the Future, Maldives President Mohamed Muizzu called for ending the Gaza war and granting Palestine full UN membership. He urged making multilateralism effective by empowering youth, combating climate change, and ensuring sustainable financing. Muizzu highlighted that future generations will judge based on concrete actions taken.
summary: At the UN Summit of the Future, Maldives President Mohamed Muizzu called for ending the Gaza war and granting Palestine full UN membership. He urged making multilateralism effective by empowering youth, combating climate change, and ensuring sustainable financing. Muizzu highlighted that future generations will judge based on concrete actions taken.

title: Who is Hassan Nasrallah, the Hezbollah leader who vowed retaliation against Israel
content: Hassan Nasrallah, Hezbollah's leader since 1992, recently addressed an attack on the group's communication devices. Supported by Iran and opposed by Israel, he has transformed Hezbollah into Lebanon's most influential political force. Despite controversies like backing Syria's Assad during the Arab Spring, Nasrallah remains a significant figure in Lebanese politics.
summary: Hassan Nasrallah, Hezbollah's leader since 1992, recently addressed an attack on the group's communication devices. Supported by Iran and opposed by Israel, he has transformed Hezbollah into Lebanon's most influential political force. Despite controversies like backing Syria's Assad during the Arab Spring, Nasrallah remains a significant figure in Lebanese politics.

title: Kamala Harris vs Donald Trump: Closest presidential race of century in US's history
content: The US presidential race between Donald Trump and Kamala Harris is highly competitive, with recent surveys showing Harris leading by just 3 points. This narrow margin highlights the intense nature of the election. Polls from CBS News and NBC News also indicate that Harris holds a slight lead over Trump.
summary: The US presidential race between Donald Trump and Kamala Harris is highly competitive, with recent surveys showing Harris leading by just 3 points. This narrow margin highlights the intense nature of the election. Polls from CBS News and NBC News also indicate that Harris holds a slight lead over Trump.

title: JetBlue flight makes emergency landing from 36k feet in minutes in US
content: A JetBlue flight from New York to San Diego made an emergency landing at Salina Regional Airport after pilots received alerts of possible smoke or fire in the cargo bay. The plane descended quickly and landed safely. No fire was detected, and passengers were transported by local school buses to the terminal.
summary: A JetBlue flight from New York to San Diego made an emergency landing at Salina Regional Airport after pilots received alerts of possible smoke or fire in the cargo bay. The plane descended quickly and landed safely. No fire was detected, and passengers were transported by local school buses to the terminal.

title: From Bibles to Sneakers: The unusual Trump merch you can buy now
content: Donald Trump has diversified from real estate to sell various items including Bibles, sneakers, suit fragments, and coins with his image. Despite previous business failures like Trump University and Trump steaks, he continues marketing these products. These sales do not fund his campaign but use his likeness under a paid license.
summary: Donald Trump has diversified from real estate to sell various items including Bibles, sneakers, suit fragments, and coins with his image. Despite previous business failures like Trump University and Trump steaks, he continues marketing these products. These sales do not fund his campaign but use his likeness under a paid license.

title: Is Yahya Sinwar alive? Unsure Israel probes Hamas leader's death
content: The Israeli military is investigating if Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar, associated with the October 7 attacks, is dead. Media reports suggest his possible death or injury in recent bombings, but Israeli intelligence lacks confirmation. Sinwar's past silence has led to false death claims before. This investigation coincides with Hamas rejecting a US-proposed hostage deal.
summary: The Israeli military is investigating if Hamas leader Yahya Sinwar, associated with the October 7 attacks, is dead. Media reports suggest his possible death or injury in recent bombings, but Israeli intelligence lacks confirmation. Sinwar's past silence has led to false death claims before. This investigation coincides with Hamas rejecting a US-proposed hostage deal.

title: Regional victory brings Germany's Scholz brief respite from growing pressure within party
content: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz's Social Democrats narrowly defeated the far-right Alternative for Germany in Brandenburg's regional election. Despite this win, Scholz faces growing criticism within his party and declining national support. Tensions are rising within the coalition government due to poor performances by junior partners, adding to political instability.
summary: German Chancellor Olaf Scholz's Social Democrats narrowly defeated the far-right Alternative for Germany in Brandenburg's regional election. Despite this win, Scholz faces growing criticism within his party and declining national support. Tensions are rising within the coalition government due to poor performances by junior partners, adding to political instability.
